title: Looking for a silver/gold team
body:
Quite bored playing solo so I´m looking for a team to join. I´m pretty active.

Roles: Any... I´ve played pretty much all of the champions and roles. I´ve been around for 5 years. (Prefer mid though)

Preferred champions: Anything with skillshots. I used to play a lot of Nidalee season 1,2,3 and I also like playing a lot of Lux, Brand, Ahri etc...
Highest rank: Season 3 I got to plat 2 on EUNE before flying to Australia, after which I worked for most of the time and didn´t have time to play much + the Aussie internet is so frustrating. I got a steady wifi now and even if someone is hogging it I´ll just use my data on my phone.

I play on my 5 year old laptop which keeps the game steady if I keep my laptops ass up so it can breathe.

If you´re interested just Add me in game: Kattron
